dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4003407E] Image Utilization Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2007 9:16 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4003407E] Image Utilization Violation ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Image Utilization Violation Added by system at Tuesday, May 8 2007 07:40 pm X-MailFrom: markkim31@comcast.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue May 8 19:40:12 2007 Received: (qmail 12782 invoked by alias); 9 May 2007 00:40:12 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 12779 invoked from network); 9 May 2007 00:40:12 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 9 May 2007 00:40:12 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 8 May 2007 19:40:12 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 08 May 2007 19:40:12 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from markkim31@comcast.net) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HlaDz-0005Rb-FO for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 08 May 2007 19:40:11 -0500 Received: from alnrmhc14.comcast.net ([204.127.225.94]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from markkim31@comcast.net) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HlaDv-000EVr-Lx for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 08 May 2007 19:40:07 -0500 Received: from [192.168.1.2] (c-24-7-213-178.hsd1.il.comcast.net[24.7.213.178]) by comcast.net (alnrmhc14) with SMTP id <20070509004005b140087qr7e>; Wed, 9 May 2007 00:40:06 +0000 Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.2) To: abuse@theplanet.com Message-Id: Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=Apple-Mail-1-648025964 From: Mark Kim Subject: Image Utilization Violation X-Priority: 1 Date: Tue, 8 May 2007 19:40:05 -0500 X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.2) X-OriginalArrivalTime: 09 May 2007 00:40:12.0209 (UTC) FILETIME=[9A59E210:01C791D2] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Offending Domains: promose7en.com (client), almightyservices.com (server) Violating image URL: http://www.almightyservices.com/therealv.jpg Reason for reporting: That image belongs to me, Mark Kim and I did NOT give anyone permission to use my images. Please warn almightyservices.com, the originating server, that unauthorized utilization of images will not be allowed. Again, that image was utilized without permission by me, Mark Kim, who owns that image. Please take disciplinary action against almightyservices.com and tell them not to engage in unauthorized use of images again. In addition, almightyservices.com and promose7en.com has not respected other people's copyrights for any image that I own. Please ensure that the offender promptly deletes the image that I've mentioned. Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. UNIX is a registered trademark of the Open Group in the United States and other countries MIME element (text/html)
Offending Domains: promose7en.com (client), almightyservices.com (server)

Violating image URL: http://www.almightyservices.com/therealv.jpg

Reason for reporting: That image belongs to me, Mark Kim and I did NOT give anyone permission to use my images.
